publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3094# Mr Duncan Hamilton: Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlandsâ€”That the Parliament notes that in the region of 2,000 civil service jobs are required in The Highlands to achieve parity with other areas; supports the move of the Highland Council and Highland and Islands Enterprise to convince the Scottish Executive to relocate the headquarters of Scottish Natural Heritage and the Scottish Arts Council to the north, and recognises that all of Scotland must benefit from the dispersal of civil service jobs in a decentralised, devolved Scotland.

S1M-3094# Mr Duncan Hamilton: Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlands-That the Parliament notes that in the region of 2,000 civil service jobs are required in the Highlands to achieve parity with other areas; supports the move of The Highland Council and Highland and Islands Enterprise to convince the Scottish Executive to relocate the headquarters of Scottish Natural Heritage and the Scottish Arts Council to the north, and recognises that all of Scotland must benefit from the dispersal of civil service jobs in a decentralised, devolved Scotland.
S1M-3094# Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlands (lodged on 9 May 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3094# Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlands (lodged on 9 May 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*, Tommy Sheridan*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-3094# Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlands (lodged on 9 May 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3094# Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlands (lodged on 9 May 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3094# Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlands (lodged on 9 May 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3094# Increase in the Number of Civil Service Jobs Located in the Highlands (lodged on 9 May 2002) Fergus Ewing*
